description: Worked on enterprise-scale projects including Ultra-Storefront (microfrontend platform with Next.js & React) and Generative AI Ninja Team (LLM-driven COBOL to Java automation). Focused on scalable architectures, AI adoption, and system design.
Contributed to Infosys Equinox Studio, building a low-code/no-code commerce platform. Focused on schema-driven rendering, localization, and client demos using Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB.
